definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: I don't know all of the acronyms.
sentences.chinese: 我不太清楚那些縮略詞。

sentences.english: The second function of your album is allowing the user to click on a thumbnail and get a blown-up version of the photo.
sentences.chinese: 相冊的第二項功能是允許用戶單擊縮略圖來查看全圖。

sentences.english: Sometimes, backronyms come from outdated language.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，反向縮略語來自於舊式語言。

sentences.english: Set this option to show the file size below the image thumbnail.
sentences.chinese: 設定此選項以在圖像縮略圖下方顯示文件大小。

sentences.english: The acronym data is stored as a string.
sentences.chinese: 縮略詞數據存儲爲字符串。

sentences.english: The first thing I did with my picture collection was generate thumbnails.
sentences.chinese: 我對照片集所執行的第一個操作是生成縮略圖。

sentences.english: Acronyms are part of our everyday language.
sentences.chinese: 縮略詞是我們日常語言的一部分。

sentences.english: Thumbnail resize for images onn stories Front and Blog page.
sentences.chinese: 調整圖像的縮略圖歐恩故事陣線和博客網頁。

sentences.english: Set this option to show the filename below the image thumbnail.
sentences.chinese: 設定此選項以在圖像縮略圖下方顯示文件名稱。

sentences.english: Each of the thumbnails nodes need to be placed along with the node label in a coherent manner.
sentences.chinese: 需要使用一致的方式放置縮略圖節點和節點標籤。

sentences.english: This has led to an upswing in thumbnails that are both clever and usable.
sentences.chinese: 這些探討導致了縮略圖在智能和可用性方面大大增強。

sentences.english: If the user clicks a thumbnail, the image will expand to full size.
sentences.chinese: 如果用戶單擊一個縮略圖，就會完全展開該圖像。

sentences.english: You need a way to define acronyms and their associated expanded meanings.
sentences.chinese: 您需要一種方法來定義縮略詞及其相關的擴展含義。

sentences.english: You should now have a functioning pager that provides the user a list of thumbnails.
sentences.chinese: 現在有了一個可用的分頁器爲用戶提供一些縮略圖。

sentences.english: First of all we have the outliner.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們有信息縮略表。

sentences.english: It then lays out a thumbnail of every image until it reaches every fifth image and starts a new row.
sentences.chinese: 然後放上每個圖片的縮略圖，每五張圖片作爲一行。
